price: 难道他们要求蒙昧时代的律例吗？在确信的民众看来，有谁比安拉更善于判决呢？
arabic: أَفَحُكۡمَ ٱلۡجَٰهِلِيَّةِ يَبۡغُونَۚ وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ حُكۡمٗا لِّقَوۡمٖ يُوقِنُونَ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: afaḥuk'ma al-jāhiliyati yabghūna waman aḥsanu mina al-lahi ḥuk'man liqawmin yūqinūna
